home.aboutUs: Liquid Mining was founded at the end of 2019 by the team of experts in blockchain programming and IT engineers. The current members of our altcoins mining team come from different scientific disciplines, but our common faith in cryptocurrencies has brought us together.
home.cloudMining: Liquid Mining is offering a wide selection of cloud mining contracts. Mining contracts with payouts in the most popular and trusted cryptocurrencies, 100+ altcoins and also a contract with a fixed payment in USDT. Choose a contract now and get the first payment to your crypto wallet tomorrow.
home.footerCloudMining: involves financial risks and may not be appropriate for all people. The information presented here is for information and educational purpose only and should not be considered an offer or solicitation to invest to Liquid Mining or elsewhere. Any investment decisions that you make are solely your responsibility.
home.liquid_mining_desc: Liquid Mining platform combines cloud mining with daily payments and Forex margin trading, options and cryptocurrencies, giving the opportunity to multiply potential income.
home.auto_reinvest: Auto reinvest and earn up 180% a year
home.we_offer: We offer you the most profitable and reliable cloud mining contracts by providing daily payouts for all the contracts in the currency of the contract.
home.start_crypto: Start cryptocurrency and stablecoins cloud mining today, and get the first payout tomorrow!
home.help_info: You can check the total amount returns against the amount you invest for this plan.
home.auto_match: Automatic matching of buyers & sellers via unique artificial intelligence approach.
home.crypto_about: Crypto is a block chain based marketplace , where buyers meet to carry out operations involving digital goods & assets with crypto currency transactions. The unique advantage here is an automatic matching of users, basing on artificial intelligence approach. It is a first ever artificial intelligence marketplace in the world, combining traditional and smart contract, block chain, future-oriented ideas of connecting people and performing operations by analyzing users preferences.
home.register_about: Register on Liquid Mining & share your interests.
home.find_goods: Find goods, assets & sellers, automatically matched by Liquid Mining.
home.buy_goods: Buy goods securely, basing on smart contract & block chain.
home.note: Note: Liquid mining accepts payments in various coins. However, you can use our partner service to make a payment by credit card. Please follow instructions.
home.after_payment_confirmation: After payment confirmation you will get your mining contract

withdrawal.referal: Liquid Mining's referral program is a bonus for anyone who wants to help expand our vision. Recommend us via your personal link and you will receive even more mining power for each recommendation.
